org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc.dialect

Class BasicJdbcDialect

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.cache.store.jdbc.dialect.BasicJdbcDialect
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, JdbcDialect
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DB2Dialect, H2Dialect, MySQLDialect, OracleDialect, SQLServerDialect

    public class BasicJdbcDialect
extends Object
implements JdbcDialect
    Basic implementation of dialect based on JDBC specification.
